text: allaah un logon ko kaise maarg dikhaega, jinhonne apane eemaan ke pashchaat adharm aur inakaar kee neeti apanaee, jabaki ve svayan is baat kee gavaahee de chuke hain ki yah rasool sachcha hai aur unake paas spasht nishaaniyaan bhee aa chukee hain? allaah atyaachaaree logon ko maarg nahin dikhaaya karata
